name: Karpov
description:
Visual novel - a genre that involves the passage of the story of the story with choices that fall on the players, on which the consequences will depend.

Project Features:
- The techniques described in the story, conscious dreams are from real practice. If you're interested in trying it, you might be able to do it;
- "Living" characters who have their own tempers, stories and fears;
- Visual style, music, sounds and animation contribute to the immersive effect.
